headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company Announces Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: GOLDEN, Colo. & MONTREAL, November 21, 2024--The Board of Directors of Molson Coors Beverage Company (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A) today declared a regular quarterly dividend on its Class A and Class B common stock of US$0.44 per share, payable December 20, 2024, to stockholders of record on December 6, 2024. The quarterly dividend is payable to holders of Class A and Class B common stock of Molson Coors Beverage Company.
